name: Config | RSVP: See You In Figma
description:
Our team had a question; How can we make it so that virtual gatherings don’t feel like it’s ‘just another virtual call’? How can we make it more engaging, enjoyable and valuable for the community to attend and interact with us live?


Our team ventured to find ways to address this by utilizing Figma in unconventional ways to create immersive connective experiences.


We invite you to join our Config 2022 talk and to try out yourself the different experiences we’re covering in our session such as an explorable virtual space, a blind shopping experience, including access to an 🌟 exclusive drop 🌟 from our team for this Config’s own 🛍 goodie bag AND a special community 🕹 activity to join in.


We hope to see you at Config and within the Figma community! 👋🏻
